title: Jondol
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of G. David Thompson
provenance_text:
James Brooks [1906-1992], New York, NY; Samuel M. Kootz Gallery, Inc., New York, NY, until January 1962 [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1962 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 45, illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Kootz Gallery.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International as a gift of Mr. G. David Thompson, Pittsburgh, PA. Receipt of payment was acknowledged by Samuel M. Kootz Gallery on January 19, 1962. The painting was accessioned on February 15, 1962.

creator.birth_place: Saint Louis (St. Louis Indep. City, Missouri, United States)
creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
